title: Will there be a day where robots like Terminator T-800 will exist? - Quora

response.answer_text: A big NO . These is highly unrealistic . Firstly , the creation of T-800 as shown in the movie . It will require a lot of time to get to such a stage of creating those advanced robots . Secondly , if we have created something sort of T-800 , then also there is hardly any chance that they will turn against us. The people who will create them have watched these movies too…☺☺
